awd_titl_txt: A Special Symposium on Surface Engineering and Tribology
awd_abstract_narration: 9315861  Saka  Partial support is provided to a symposium which will explore the relative roles of tribology and surface engineering, where tribology is defined as the study of surfaces in relative motion, and surface engineering is seen as the intended creation of surfaces with specific properties.  ***     n   o     COMPOSITPRE            \A  '2q  93AWARDSXLS           eJ   &    SUSDEVELDOC            v   %^   SETNYIPSDOC           Py    V   MAYPANL DOC           <{        FUTYRCMTDOC            vk  &%   9315861  Saka  Partial support is provided to a symposium which will explore the relative roles of tribology and surface enginee     !         !
